## WorkspaceSvg.getDragTarget() method

Returns the drag target the mouse event is over.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDragTarget(e: Event): IDragTarget | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event | Mouse move event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[IDragTarget](./blockly.idragtarget.md) \| null

Null if not over a drag target, or the drag target the event is over.
